attributes.action: block the current US proposal to place ballistic missile sites on British soil.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The US has recently unveiled a plan to place some anti-nuclear missile missile sites in some European countries. The UK being one of them. 

If the USA want to carry on their pointless war-mongering then they should do it off our land and leave us to be free from their control. We are not a puppydog for the USA (although Mr Blair might disagree with me on that one) and we do NOT want their military on our soil (any more than they already are).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
